name: Necrorun
summary:
► Play as Death on its horse, reaping everything in your path.
► Attack in any direction just by touching the screen. You are in FULL control of your death weapon.
► Joust duel with knights. You have never looked so noble playing with your phone.
► Beautiful and idyllic day/night cycles.
► Complete Trials to get higher scores, and get Medals for executing challenges.
► Great soundtrack.
► Destroy all obstacles and living creatures without missing any to increase your Combo Multiplier and score even higher.
► Fun to be played over and over, whether you have a lot of time to spend or just a few minutes.
